name: UIPasteboard.OptionsKey
desc: Options for describing pasteboard privacy. Use these options with the setItems(_:options:) method. Options that you set apply to all the items on a pasteboard.

items.name: static let expirationDate: UIPasteboard.OptionsKey
items.desc: An NSDate value that specifies the time and date that you want the system to remove the pasteboard items from the pasteboard.

items.name: static let localOnly: UIPasteboard.OptionsKey
items.desc: A Boolean value, expressed as an NSNumber type, that specifies that the pasteboard items should not be available to other devices through the Handoff feature.
